intro: Canthium rubens, commonly known as red spurge or red devil, is a tropical flowering plant native to Central and South America. It is a member of the Euphorbiaceae family, which includes many plants with milky sap. The plant is characterized by its spiny stems and clusters of small, greenish-yellow flowers. Its leaves are alternate, ovate, and often have a rough texture. Canthium rubens is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks.
